Class LightAdminRepositoryRestMvcConfiguration

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurer

    @Configuration
@ComponentScan(basePackages="org.lightadmin.core.web",
               includeFilters=,
               useDefaultFilters=false)
public class LightAdminRepositoryRestMvcConfiguration
extends org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.config.RepositoryRestMvcConfiguration
